title: San Diego/Point Loma-Ocean Beach
name: Ocean Beach Municipal Pier
address: at the south end of the beach
content: Extends out over the waves and offers great views of the beautiful Pacific Ocean and coast. A tackle shop, located in the middle of the pier, provides bait and supplies for the many fishing enthusiasts who frequent the area. This is one of the few places that visitors can fish without a California fishing license. Pole rentals are available at the bait shop as well.
